trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONDRAGONSONGWAR_00000_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_000<tab>So ends an alternate chapter in their tale. What lessons, dear listener, might we derive from this Dragonsong reimagined?
TEXT_DUNGEONDRAGONSONGWAR_00000_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>Be it that of man or dragon, all life is precious, and the loss of loved ones shall ever darken the hearts of those left behind.
TEXT_DUNGEONDRAGONSONGWAR_00000_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_001<tab>Yet death is not the end of what was wrought. The memories forged, the affection shared, the hope inherited...
TEXT_DUNGEONDRAGONSONGWAR_00000_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_002<tab>Such things grant us the strength to walk unto the morrow, and there is no greater proof of this than the Warrior of Light's journey.
TEXT_DUNGEONDRAGONSONGWAR_00000_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>From the fantastical works of a wandering minstrel <var 1A 02 /var>Heavensward: A Reimagining<var 1A 01 /var>
